title: Why does firefox set targeting cookies to inactive by default?
content:
Having just deployed a new OneTrust cookie compliance solution on my website, in the setup I have set the Performance, Functional and Targeting cookies to be 'on' by default.

The very odd thing - to me, in any case - is that no matter what I do, i cannot get firefox to allow targeting cookies to be set as 'on' by default.

Image attached for illustrative purposes.

The settings function perfectly well in Chrome and also in Edge. firefox is the only browser that these targeting cookies will not display as 'on' in by default.

I am guessing there may be something that i may have set my side.
creator: stripeycat

title: Firefox displays SSL_ERROR_HANDSHAKE_UNEXPECTED_ALERT frequently.
content: From past few days I am getting error named SSL_ERROR_HANDSHAKE_UNEXPECTED_ALERT frequently.When I clear active logins from history it goes away but after some time it again displays same message no mattter which website is open.
creator: abhay.jagtap000

title: List of downloads
content: Recently (probably after an update) Firefox starts showing my list of downloads automatically and unwanted after each download. So I want to download a few MP3's from a website. I click on one, select the download option, and when it is done downloading a drop down display comes down from the Menu bar showing my last downloads. Obviously, as I download more, this list gets longer. I know I can make the list disappear by clicking anywhere on the screen, but it is an extra click to get rid of a feature I don't want. How do I turn that off?
creator: DBoyhdNL

title: Text gets highlighted when pausing/resuming a video on YouTube.
content:
Hello guys, the problem is that even the tiniest courser movement while clinking on a video to pause/resume results in highlighting a big section of the page. Drag and Drop works fine anywhere else on the page, but as soon as you hover over the video player, every click triggers Drag and Drop without reason. The country label on the left cover above the YouTube logo is a good indication for this problem.

I would very much appreciate your help!
creator: andyspitze56

title: When trying to view pdf's firefox also downloads them to my computer
content:
Since few days/weeks firefox has been downloading some files to my computer.

It happens when i'm viewing them in firefox. everything works as usual but files also appear to have downloaded to my desktop.

I have tryed to change everything related in options and no affect.

Is this some known bug?
creator: masa.rautajoki

title: problem with changing the volume of one card
content: Why can't I change the volume in one tab? During a meeting, for example, the radio is on, and it is much louder than the meeting, and you cannot adjust the volume of a single tab. This is very bothersome, not only in the above case. These pages determine the volume themselves. Some have regulations on the site, but not always. I am very tired of this problem. Are there any ways to change the volume of a given tab?

title: building Firefox with gpsd support on ubuntu 20.04
content:
Hi,

i'm trying to build firefox with gpsd support on ubuntu 20.04 but it fails with:

"ERROR: Package libgps was not found in the pkg-config search path"

i have libgps-dev and libgps installed and are in pkg-config path

version is >= 3.11

some hints?

Thanks in advance
creator: franz.angeli

title: Private window breaches privacy - Unacceptable
content:
I opened Private window in Firefox desktop browser for Mac, to login to gmail account. After few minutes of usage, I closed the Private window. When I opened a new Private window the 2nd time and open gmail.com, I could see I am not signed out of the gmail account. This is breach of privacy and highly unacceptable.

Why is my account still logged in, even while using Private window? What if I was using this in a public computer? Utterly scared now of my privacy and security in using Firefox.

title: When opening PDFs in it keeps downloading them as well.
content: Suddenly whenever I open a PDF with Firefox it automatically downloads it and when it try to open a PDF with a different app like Microsoft Edge it still downloads it and fails to open in the different app. This just started occurring on its own I don't know how to fix it. The settings for PDFs is always ask which is how I've kept it for a long time.
creator: dinoking7

title: Ttwo vesions of Firefox on my Win 10 computer. Only one contains my site passwords. I would like to delete the other
content: For some reason I have two copies of Firefox in my program files. The versions are 97.0.1 and 98.0.2. Only 97.0.1 contains all of my site passwords. I'm not sure how to delete or disable version 98.0.2 which does not contain my site passwords. They seem to come up randomly when I click a link that opens Firefox and I never know which version will appear. Is it OK to simply uninstall the version I don't want without losing the passwords in the other version?
creator: ws15

title: Firexfox Browser Crashes on Ubuntu 18.04
content: I have noticed that sometimes the firefox browser crashes when a video is playing. This has happened multiple times now. To debug the issue, this time i started the browser using terminal so that when the browser crash i will see the message on the terminal. This time i was watching a youtube video. And while the video was playing the browser first hangs(meaning the screen/video freezes and browser doesn't respond to any clicks or anything) for first 2-3 minutes and then it crashes. This time since i had started the firefox from terminal, after the crash i got the following printed out on the terminal: ``` user@user-Inspiron-xxxx:~$ /usr/lib/firefox/./firefox Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. Exiting due to channel error. CPU time limit exceeded (core dumped) ``` I am using Ubuntu 18.04 and Firefox version 98.0(64 bit). I have downloaded the tar file of this version from Mozilla's official site and then installed it manually on my machine. Can someone help me solve the issue and also tell me the reason for this crash.
creator: jlame646

title: Add-Ons & User Profiles
content:
Hello,

I would like to install an extension but the extensions requires "Access your data for all websites".

Can I disable the add-on for the primary user profile & activate it ONLY for the secondary user profile?

The idea is that I can use the primary profile for day-to-day personal & business purposes & then use the 2nd profile ONLY when I need the add-on to be active.

Thank You!

The latter is probable as the menu item is no longer in the menu. Is there an "about:config" setting to get that back? Thanks.

title: RSS feed in Firefox browser doesnt show, Only downloads now
content:
Hello,

Trying to just preview my rss feeds for my website. Before, typing the RSS feed link into the browser would at least produce some results. Now, it just asks to save file. I only want to preview it.

I've read around and can't find much on the actual feed reader side of firefox. On wikipedia, it says firefox still has a feed reader built in. Firefox support pages say live bookmarks were removed, etc. I just want to view the feed in browser.

I downloaded an addon "Feed Preview" or something similar, now I can view the feed in browser again. The thing is, this addons says it has access to ALL of my firefox data. I already feel some kind of way about downloading this app and then after asks for perms. So I'd prefer not to just use any "addon". RSS feed reader should come basic for browsers.

What is the best way around this? or is my browser just bugged?
creator: awleach05

title: Bookmarks Disappeared
content: After a computer reboot, ALL my bookmarks have disappeared. I'm running Firefox 98.0.2 on Mac 10.14.6 - I've followed all the 'help' advice: I opened firefox profiles, it only shows one. I rebooted Firefox (I was left with bare bones) and still no bookmarks and still only one profile. I've looked in the computer 'library' and I can find nothing compressed (the bookmarkbackups folder has 15 items but all are dated 2022). Can someone please help me retrieve them, I'm in the middle of a project and NEED the bookmarks. Thank you in advance!

title: logging out
content:
it keeps logging me out of the account every time i open the browser. i have done the steps listed and nothing works. "Your ‘logged-in’ status is stored in special cookies. If the cookie is removed, you are logged out. You may be in Private Browsing mode or told Firefox not to remember. Type about:preferences#privacy<enter> in the address bar. The button next to History, select Use Custom Settings. Turn off Always Use Private Browsing Mode. Turn on Remember My Browsing And Download History At the bottom of the page, turn on Clear History When Firefox Closes. At the far right, press the Settings button. Turn on ONLY Cache and Form And Search History leaving the others off."

it doesn't work

also i press to make it my default browser and it says "it is control by my organization". whatever that means.
creator: emirizarrymartir
